name: THE HILLS HAVE PREY
description:
Escape from the mines of the cannibal mutants! In the 20th century between 1945 and 1962 the united states conducted 331 atmosferic nuclear tests.  Now this territory is abandoned ......

Necessarily download all part 1 and 2!!! Start unpacking with 1 part. When unpacking the 2 part, agree to change the all files.
